text: The 2007 British Formula 3 International Series was the 57th British Formula 3 International Series season. It commenced on 9 April 2007 and ended on 30 September after twenty two races, with Estonian driver Marko Asmer crowned champion. ==Teams and drivers== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%;" |- !
